default.name: Guest
default.message: Welcome to your personalized Sintra board! This is a beautiful custom piece created just for you.

sky001.name: Xavier Sky
sky001.message: This portrait is not just a picture — it’s a reminder of how much Momii and Dadii loves you, more than words can ever say.

yuricookie001.name: Yuri & cookei
yuricookie001.message: You are more than pets—you’re my family, my joy, and my comfort. Every cuddle, every bark, every wag means the world to me.

aaliyah001.name: aaliyah
aaliyah001.message: This portrait captures our smiles, but the real treasure is the love we share every day. No matter where life takes us, may this always remind us that together is our favorite place to be. ❤️

vip013.name: VIP Customer
vip013.message: As one of our VIP customers, you receive this exclusive Sintra board design...

rose001.name: Rose
rose001.message: Family is where life begins and love never ends. This portrait is a reminder that we are forever one.

vip020.name: VIP Customer
vip020.message: Your Sintra board represents hours of careful craftsmanship and attention to detail. Each element was thoughtfully chosen to create something truly one-of-a-kind for you.

mamapapa001.name: Mama & Papa
mamapapa001.message: Your Sintra board represents hours of careful craftsmanship and attention to detail. Each element was thoughtfully chosen to create something truly one-of-a-kind for you.

vip016.name: VIP Customer
vip016.message: We're thrilled to present your personalized Sintra board! This piece captures your vision and brings it to life in a stunning visual format.

demo.name: Demo User
demo.message: This is a demonstration of how your personalized Sintra board experience would look. Each customer receives a unique design tailored to their preferences.
